alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 3:52PM EST until January 27 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Crawford county. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will increase in intensity across the snowbelt this evening with accumulations more likely as temperatures cool after sunset.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
